snippet.title: Live Coding: Django CLI & cron (Website Up Checker)
snippet.description:
Today I am building a Django application meant for command-line usage and cron jobs. Django doesn't have to be used for web applications. I will demonstrate how to create command-line programs that utilizes Django ORM, shell, and management commands without any HTML templates, web interface, or WSGI web server setup.

Support the stream: https://streamlabs.com/devdungeon
Join Discord: https://discord.gg/JWsSHJC
Get $100 credit for signing up to Digital Ocean: https://m.do.co/c/5ccd98162d85 
Buy my book: Security with Go https://www.packtpub.com/networking-and-servers/security-go
Website: https://www.devdungeon.com
YouTube: https://www.youtube.com/DevDungeon
